name: Water Surfer Floating Car
description:
Are you like floating water car simulation games? If yes! Then you will love to play Water Surfer Floating Car. Enjoy the wonderful car surfing on the beautiful sea water. Get the real adventure of as car surfer and float your fast sports car on the beach water. Water Surfer Floating Car is for the lovers of extreme car driving games or car simulation games

Features:
• Amazing floating & surfing sports car
• Console Quality HD Graphics
• Realistic car physics
• Easy, smooth and intuitive controls
• Realistic and effective sounds
• Addictive game play
• Challenging levels
